entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
